TopicTitle: Star trek-type Bridge parts and IVA mod

Articles.Content:
I've been searching, but I can't seem to find anything.

 

I'm a big Star Trek fan, and I'm just wondering if there are any mods out there that have a Star Trek type bridge with IVA. 

 

I'm currently running KSP 1.9.1 on a Mac desktop.
Ksp IE extended provides a star trek(ish) style command pod.

The KSPIE one is actually a forked copy of this:

https://spacedock.info/mod/589/IXS-Warpship-OS

Peace.

Eureka! I found it! Someone resurrected the old OPT Spaceplane Systems mod. 

https://spacedock.info/mod/1808/OPT Reconfig

When you download the actual mod, you are going to have to update the Firespitter plugin tho. The one that is bundled with the mod is out-of-date.

 

Edit: you also need the B9 Part Switch for it to work as well.

Edited May 15, 2020 by NewsDude
